member.name: T:Cardinal.AspNetCore.BackgroundServices.Cron
member.summary: Helper class that provides common values for the cron expressions.

member.name: M:Cardinal.AspNetCore.BackgroundServices.Cron.Minutely
member.summary: Returns cron expression that fires every minute.

member.name: M:Cardinal.AspNetCore.BackgroundServices.Cron.Hourly
member.summary: Returns cron expression that fires every hour at the first minute.

member.name: M:Cardinal.AspNetCore.BackgroundServices.Cron.Hourly(System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns cron expression that fires every hour at the specified minute.
member.param: The minute in which the schedule will be activated (0-59).

member.name: M:Cardinal.AspNetCore.BackgroundServices.Cron.Daily
member.summary: Returns cron expression that fires every day at 00:00 UTC.

member.name: M:Cardinal.AspNetCore.BackgroundServices.Cron.Daily(System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns cron expression that fires every day at the first minute of the specified hour in UTC.
member.param: The hour in which the schedule will be activated (0-23).

member.name: M:Cardinal.AspNetCore.BackgroundServices.Cron.Daily(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns cron expression that fires every day at the specified hour and minute in UTC.
member.param: The hour in which the schedule will be activated (0-23).
The minute in which the schedule will be activated (0-59).

member.name: M:Cardinal.AspNetCore.BackgroundServices.Cron.Weekly
member.summary: Returns cron expression that fires every week at Monday, 00:00 UTC.

member.name: M:Cardinal.AspNetCore.BackgroundServices.Cron.Weekly(System.DayOfWeek)
member.summary: Returns cron expression that fires every week at 00:00 UTC of the specified day of the week.
member.param: The day of week in which the schedule will be activated.

member.name: M:Cardinal.AspNetCore.BackgroundServices.Cron.Weekly(System.DayOfWeek,System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns cron expression that fires every week at the first minute of the specified day of week and hour in UTC.
member.param: The day of week in which the schedule will be activated.
The hour in which the schedule will be activated (0-23).

member.name: M:Cardinal.AspNetCore.BackgroundServices.Cron.Weekly(System.DayOfWeek,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns cron expression that fires every week at the specified day of week, hour and minute in UTC.
member.param: The day of week in which the schedule will be activated.
The hour in which the schedule will be activated (0-23).
The minute in which the schedule will be activated (0-59).

member.name: M:Cardinal.AspNetCore.BackgroundServices.Cron.Monthly
member.summary: Returns cron expression that fires every month at 00:00 UTC of the first day of month.

member.name: M:Cardinal.AspNetCore.BackgroundServices.Cron.Monthly(System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns cron expression that fires every month at 00:00 UTC of the specified day of month.
member.param: The day of month in which the schedule will be activated (1-31).

member.name: M:Cardinal.AspNetCore.BackgroundServices.Cron.Monthly(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns cron expression that fires every month at the first minute of the specified day of month and hour in UTC.
member.param: The day of month in which the schedule will be activated (1-31).
The hour in which the schedule will be activated (0-23).

member.name: M:Cardinal.AspNetCore.BackgroundServices.Cron.Monthly(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns cron expression that fires every month at the specified day of month, hour and minute in UTC.
member.param: The day of month in which the schedule will be activated (1-31).
The hour in which the schedule will be activated (0-23).
The minute in which the schedule will be activated (0-59).

member.name: M:Cardinal.AspNetCore.BackgroundServices.Cron.Yearly
member.summary: Returns cron expression that fires every year on Jan, 1st at 00:00 UTC.

member.name: M:Cardinal.AspNetCore.BackgroundServices.Cron.Yearly(System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns cron expression that fires every year in the first day at 00:00 UTC of the specified month.
member.param: The month in which the schedule will be activated (1-12).

member.name: M:Cardinal.AspNetCore.BackgroundServices.Cron.Yearly(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns cron expression that fires every year at 00:00 UTC of the specified month and day of month.
member.param: The month in which the schedule will be activated (1-12).
The day of month in which the schedule will be activated (1-31).

member.name: M:Cardinal.AspNetCore.BackgroundServices.Cron.Yearly(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns cron expression that fires every year at the first minute of the specified month, day and hour in UTC.
member.param: The month in which the schedule will be activated (1-12).
The day of month in which the schedule will be activated (1-31).
The hour in which the schedule will be activated (0-23).

member.name: M:Cardinal.AspNetCore.BackgroundServices.Cron.Yearly(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns cron expression that fires every year at the specified month, day, hour and minute in UTC.
member.param: The month in which the schedule will be activated (1-12).
The day of month in which the schedule will be activated (1-31).
The hour in which the schedule will be activated (0-23).
The minute in which the schedule will be activated (0-59).

member.name: M:Cardinal.AspNetCore.BackgroundServices.Cron.Never
member.summary: Returns cron expression that never fires. Specifically 31st of February

member.name: M:Cardinal.AspNetCore.BackgroundServices.Cron.MinuteInterval(System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns cron expression that fires every <> minutes.
member.param: The number of minutes to wait between every activation.

member.name: M:Cardinal.AspNetCore.BackgroundServices.Cron.HourInterval(System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns cron expression that fires every <> hours.
member.param: The number of hours to wait between every activation.

member.name: M:Cardinal.AspNetCore.BackgroundServices.Cron.DayInterval(System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns cron expression that fires every <> days.
member.param: The number of days to wait between every activation.

member.name: M:Cardinal.AspNetCore.BackgroundServices.Cron.MonthInterval(System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns cron expression that fires every <> months.
member.param: The number of months to wait between every activation.

member.name: T:Cardinal.AspNetCore.BackgroundServices.Localization.Resource
member.summary: Uma classe de recurso de tipo de alta segurança, para pesquisar cadeias de caracteres localizadas etc.

member.name: P:Cardinal.AspNetCore.BackgroundServices.Localization.Resource.ResourceManager
member.summary: Retorna a instância de ResourceManager armazenada em cache usada por essa classe.

member.name: P:Cardinal.AspNetCore.BackgroundServices.Localization.Resource.Culture
member.summary: Substitui a propriedade CurrentUICulture do thread atual para todas as pesquisas de recursos que usam essa classe de recurso de tipo de alta segurança.

member.name: P:Cardinal.AspNetCore.BackgroundServices.Localization.Resource.ERROR_CONFIGURATION_NULL
member.summary: Consulta uma cadeia de caracteres localizada semelhante a Null or invalid configuration arguments!.

member.name: P:Cardinal.AspNetCore.BackgroundServices.Localization.Resource.ERROR_CRON_INVALID
member.summary: Consulta uma cadeia de caracteres localizada semelhante a The Cron expression is invalid!.

member.name: P:Cardinal.AspNetCore.BackgroundServices.Localization.Resource.ERROR_CRON_NULL_EMPTY
member.summary: Consulta uma cadeia de caracteres localizada semelhante a The Cron expression is null or empty!.
